name: Boss Battle Demo
description:
Defeat the boss!

Watch out for his black death rays and kicks!

Be careful, once it gets mad, it will storm at you !

Use the arrow keys to move. 

Right mouse button for jump

Drag and release the left mouse button for throwing a bomb

Art credit:

Hugues Labordes(https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/)

https://adwitr.itch.io/pixel-health-bar-asset-pack-2(health bar credit)

Grenade art credit: https://grafxkid.itch.io/

Explosion art credit: Ansimuz(https://ansimuz.itch.io/)
